doc:
Bianca Ferguson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bianca_Ferguson 0 Bianca Ferguson (born February 11, 1955) is an American actress from Gary, Indiana.Ferguson is best known for playing Claudia Johnston Phillips on the soap opera General Hospital from 1978 to 1987. She was also married to the late former Designing Women actor, Meshach Taylor. Bianca_Ferguson ( born February_11_,_1955 ) is an_American_actress from Gary , Indiana.Ferguson is_best_known for playing Claudia_Johnston_Phillips on the_soap_opera_General_Hospital from 1978 to 1987 . She was_also_married to the_late_former_Designing_Women_actor , Meshach_Taylor .
